'''''The Stellar Moments Vol. 5''''' is the fifth character [[soundtrack]] album ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

It features a total of 32 soundtracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team, all original compositions for the following characters: [[Arlecchino]], [[Chasca]], [[Chiori]], [[Citlali]], [[Clorinde]], [[Emilie]], [[Gaming]], [[Kachina]], [[Kinich]], [[Mavuika]], [[Mualani]], [[Navia]], [[Ororon]], [[Sethos]], [[Sigewinne]], [[Xianyun]], and [[Xilonen]].

The album was first announced on December 20, 2024, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 5.3]]. The album was released on January 15, 2025.
